remarks.format: ## Remarks `JsonReaderState`需要在读取不完整数据时支持重入, 并在有更多数据可用时继续读取。`JsonReaderState` is required to support reentrancy when reading incomplete data, and to continue reading once more data is available. 与作为 ref 结构的结构不同,此类型可在异步/等待边界内保留,因此,在继续使用的新实例之前,需要为异步读取更多数据提供支持。Unlike the struct, which is a ref struct, this type can survive across async/await boundaries, and hence it's required to provide support for reading more data asynchronously before continuing with a new instance of the .
